analysis.description: ECDSA.recover (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#41-81) is declared view but contains assembly code
Subscription.checkSuccess (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#687-696) is declared view but contains assembly code

Subscription.executeSubscription (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#587-673) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(tokenAddress).transferFrom(from,to,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#639)
	-ERC20(tokenAddress).transferFrom(from,msg.sender,gasPrice) (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#661-665)

Subscription.isSubscriptionActive (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#473-478) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp <= nextValidTimestamp[subscriptionHash].add(gracePeriodSeconds)) (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#477-478)

Subscription.isSubscriptionReady (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#523-552) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (signer == from && from != to && block.timestamp >= nextValidTimestamp[subscriptionHash] && allowance >= tokenAmount.add(gasPrice) && balance >= tokenAmount.add(gasPrice)) (/unique_chucks/32/0xb4076d570bd84af0257e3f1c3a40920a5aa033dd.sol#547-552)

elements.expression: (signer == from && from != to && block.timestamp >= nextValidTimestamp[subscriptionHash] && allowance >= tokenAmount.add(gasPrice) && balance >= tokenAmount.add(gasPrice))
